Package sorcer.core.provider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdministratableProvider  
    Auditor
    All implementation of this interface are Service providers in SORCER and are used to save ServiceContext sent to it.
    Caller  
    Cataloger
    Defines the interface for the SORCER catalog service.
    Concatenator
    A service coordinating a Block execution by creating a runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute all component exertions of the received job.
    DatabaseStorer  
    DataspaceStorer  
    Exerter
    A functionality for running exertions with given parameters.
    FileStorer
    The file store interface to access remote directories.
    Jobber
    A service coordinating a Job execution by creating a runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute all component exertions of the received job.
    Modeler
    A service coordinating a Model execution by creating a runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute all requested entries (variables) of the received model.
    MonitorManagementSession  
    Provider
    This is an interface that defines how a provider interacts with other code the through the methods that are exposed.
    ProviderAdminMBean
    Provides a standard MBean to use when administering a Provider using JMX *
    RemoteLogger  
    RemoteServiceShell
    A service shell creates and manages runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute an exertion.
    Rendezvous
    A service coordinating execution by creating of composite exertions; where service providers meet to collaborate.
    SessionManagement
    Created by Mike Sobolewski on 8/30/17.
    SorcerJobber
    A tag interface for SORCER Jobber
    Spacer
    SORCER also extends task/job execution abilities through the use of a space rendezvous service implementing the Spacer interface.
    StorageManagement  
    SysCaller

    ArithmeticNetBlockTest

    ControlFlowManager
    The ControlFlowManager class is responsible for handling control flow mograms (Conditional, NetJob, NetTask).
    MonitoringControlFlowManager  
    ProviderAccessorTest  
    ProviderAdmin
    Implements ProviderMBean as a standard MBean
    ProviderDelegate
    There are two types of SORCER service servers: generic service servers - subclasses of ServiceProvider - and service beans - classes of implementing one or more SORCER service types.
    ProviderDelegate.ExertionSessionInfo  
    ProviderName
    Created by Mike Sobolewski
    ProviderRuntime  
    ProviderSession  
    ServiceName
    Created by Mike Sobolewski on 5/22/16.
    ServiceProvider
    The ServiceProvider class is a type of Provider with dependency injection defined by a Jini 2 configuration, proxy management, and own service discovery management for registering its proxies.
    ServiceTasker
    A ServiceTasker is a service coordinating execution of all signatures of a task according its control strategy.
    SessionBeanProvider
    Created by Mike Sobolewski on 8/29/17.
    SpaceIsReadyTaker  
    SpaceTaker
    This is a class creates a JavaSpace taker that extends the Thread class and implements the interfaces LeaseListener and SorcerConstants
    SpaceTaker.SpaceTakerData
